channel.title: There is no Third Step
channel.description: This is a place for all of my stories and writing things

item.title: Welcome to the New There is no Third Step.
item.description:
This is the second iteration of this blog the first was hosted on amazon AWS this one will be hosted using GitHub pages.

There is no third step was created thanks to my family much like everything that i do. My brother was trying to put up a guard on
item.dc:creator: Chris Yarland-Price
item.content:encoded:
This is the second iteration of this blog the first was hosted on amazon AWS this one will be hosted using GitHub pages.

There is no third step was created thanks to my family much like everything that i do. My brother was trying to put up a guard on my grandparents bed and was explaining what to do.

"Step one: Put the strap under the bed, Step two: clip the strap together. There is no third step."

Unfortunately for him there was a slight problem. so when i became involved all that was happening was him screaming across the bed.

"There is no third step, there is no third step!"

Whilst i was teaing him about it later on i started to think about that saying and the fact that in my life i sometimes needed to remember that sometimes there is no third step. Step one is to decide to do something. Step two is to actually do that thing.

I know that there is more to planning a project than that but it is a good reminder that you can overplan everything which was something that i tended to do at the time.

Thanks for visiting and i'll see you all soon.

Chris
